Package ohos.media.tubecore

Interface AVTubeManager.TubeObserver

  • Enclosing class:
    AVTubeManager

    public static interface AVTubeManager.TubeObserver
    Provides callbacks to listen for media tube changes. For example, a media tube is added, deleted, or changed, or its working state changes.
    Since:
    5
    See Also:
    AVTubeManager.addTubeObserver(TubeObserver, int, int), AVTubeManager.removeTubeObserver(TubeObserver)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onTubeDelete​(AVTubeManager tubeManager, AVTube tube)
      Called when an AVTube instance is deleted from this AVTubeManager.
      void onTubeEnterWorkingState​(AVTubeManager tubeManager, AVTube tube, int usageScenes)
      Called when a media tube enters the working state.
      void onTubeExitWorkingState​(AVTubeManager tubeManager, AVTube tube, int usageScenes)
      Called when a media tube exits the working state.
      void onTubeInsert​(AVTubeManager tubeManager, AVTube tube)
      Called when a new AVTube instance is added to this AVTubeManager.
      void onTubeUpdate​(AVTubeManager tubeManager, AVTube tube)
      Called when an attribute of a specified AVTube instance is changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onTubeEnterWorkingState

        void onTubeEnterWorkingState​(AVTubeManager tubeManager,
                             AVTube tube,
                             int usageScenes)
        Called when a media tube enters the working state.

        This callback is invoked after the AVTubeManager#useTube(AVTube, int) method is called and the specified AVTube instance enters the working state.

        Parameters:
        tubeManager - Indicates this AVTubeManager.
        tube - Indicates the AVTube instance in use.
        usageScenes - Indicates the scenes for which the AVTube instance is used.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        AVTubeManager.useTube(AVTube, int)

      • onTubeExitWorkingState

        void onTubeExitWorkingState​(AVTubeManager tubeManager,
                            AVTube tube,
                            int usageScenes)
        Called when a media tube exits the working state.

        This callback is invoked after the AVTubeManager#useTube(AVTube, int) method is called and the specified AVTube instance exits the working state.

        Parameters:
        tubeManager - Indicates this AVTubeManager.
        tube - Indicates the AVTube instance that exits the working state.
        usageScenes - Indicates the scenes for which the AVTube instance is used.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        AVTubeManager.useTube(AVTube, int)

      • onTubeInsert

        void onTubeInsert​(AVTubeManager tubeManager,
                  AVTube tube)
        Called when a new AVTube instance is added to this AVTubeManager.

        This callback is invoked after the AVTubeManager#insertAVTubeEx(AVTubeEx) method is called.

        Parameters:
        tubeManager - Indicates this AVTubeManager.
        tube - Indicates the added AVTube instance.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        AVTubeManager.insertAVTubeEx(AVTubeEx)

      • onTubeDelete

        void onTubeDelete​(AVTubeManager tubeManager,
                  AVTube tube)
        Called when an AVTube instance is deleted from this AVTubeManager.

        This callback is invoked after the AVTubeManager#deleteAVTubeEx(AVTubeEx) method is called.

        Parameters:
        tubeManager - Indicates this AVTubeManager.
        tube - Indicates the deleted AVTube instance.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        AVTubeManager.deleteAVTubeEx(AVTubeEx)

      • onTubeUpdate

        void onTubeUpdate​(AVTubeManager tubeManager,
                  AVTube tube)
        Called when an attribute of a specified AVTube instance is changed.

        This callback is invoked after a media tube attribute, such as the name, label, or description, is set.

        Parameters:
        tubeManager - Indicates this AVTubeManager.
        tube - Indicates the AVTube instance whose attribute is changed.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        AVTube.setLabel(Object), AVTubeEx.setTubeName(int), AVTubeEx.setTubeName(String), AVTubeEx.setDetails(String)
